org.teatrove.trove.file
Class NonTxFileBuffer

java.lang.Object
  org.teatrove.trove.file.NonTxFileBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileBuffer, TxFileBuffer
Direct Known Subclasses:
TaggedTxFileBuffer
public class NonTxFileBuffer
extends Object
implements TxFileBuffer

A TxFileBuffer implementation that satisfies the API requirements, but doesn't actually do anything useful for transactions. All calls are delegated to a wrapped FileBuffer, and calls to write and truncate call begin and commit. At a minimum, subclasses implementing transaction support need to override only begin and commit.

Author:
Brian S O'Neill

close

public void close(long timeout)
           throws IOException
Description copied from interface: TxFileBuffer
Waits for all transactions to commit or rollback before closing file. A timeout must be specified for the wait. If the value is -1, the timeout is infinite.

Specified by:
close in interface TxFileBuffer
